item.title: Random thought of the day
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Would you rather be part of an indie band with a few sales through a small group of distribution points or be part of the same band with no retail distribution points except a million downloads through your internet site?
item.excerpt:encoded: Would you rather be part of an indie band with a few sales through a small group of distribution points or be part of the same band with no retail distribution points except a million downloads through your internet site?
